benchmark_details.name: MMBench-Video
benchmark_details.overview: MMBench-Video introduces a quantitative benchmark designed to rigorously evaluate large vision-language models' proficiency in video understanding, incorporating lengthy videos from YouTube with free-form questions to assess temporal reasoning skills.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the effectiveness of large vision-language models in video understanding using long-form, diverse video content.

data.source: Videos collected from YouTube, with questions and answers annotated by volunteers.

methodology.calculation: Scores range from 0 to 3 based on semantic similarity between model outputs and ground-truth answers.
methodology.interpretation: A higher score indicates better alignment with human judgments for correctness.
methodology.validation: Evaluation includes a robust assessment of various LVLMs using the MMBench-Video dataset.
